tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_nutrient_levels_table (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT,
  potassium_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SoilNutrientLevels (
    Id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Location VARCHAR(255),
    NitrogenLevel DECIMAL,
    PhosphorusLevel DECIMAL,
    PotassiumLevel DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CropDetails (
    CropId INT PRIMARY KEY,
    CropName VARCHAR(255),
    RecommendedNitrogen DECIMAL,
    RecommendedPhosphorus DECIMAL,
    RecommendedPotassium DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE FertilizerApplication (
    ApplicationId INT PRIMARY KEY,
    CropId INT REFERENCES CropDetails(CropId),
    NitrogenApplied DECIMAL,
    PhosphorusApplied DECIMAL,
    PotassiumApplied DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    nitrogen_level FLOAT,
    phosphorus_level FLOAT,
    potassium_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(100),
    optimal_nitrogen_level FLOAT,
    optimal_phosphorus_level FLOAT,
    optimal_potassium_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Fertilizers (
    fertilizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fertilizer_name VARCHAR(100),
    nitrogen_content FLOAT,
    phosphorus_content FLOAT,
    potassium_content FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE FieldTests (
    test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    nitrogen_application FLOAT,
    phosphorus_application FLOAT,
    potassium_application FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES SoilSamples(sample_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(crop_id)
)

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  nitrogen_level DECIMAL,
  phosphorus_level DECIMAL,
  potassium_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE crops (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  optimal_nitrogen_level DECIMAL,
  optimal_phosphorus_level DECIMAL,
  optimal_potassium_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_types (
  fertilizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fertilizer_name VARCHAR(255),
  nitrogen_content DECIMAL,
  phosphorus_content DECIMAL,
  potassium_content DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE soil_test_results (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  crop_id INT,
  nitrogen_level DECIMAL,
  phosphorus_level DECIMAL,
  potassium_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  fertilizer_id INT,
  recommendation_info TEXT
)
